title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
I want to talk about all that's happened to us. We should get to know each other a little more. We should journey separately for now. I'll look for you here if I need you again. Leave.

Choosing the second option will make here say that we don't necessarily need to, and there's no harm in a little mystery. This will open up four new dialogue options:

You don't want to talk about yourself? We have to rely on each other. Easier if we knew each other as well. Just looking to make conversation. I
